Reviews.Title: “Is it Beer or Berr?”

Reviews.Content: bring own shampoo allocated double arrival fairly compared prefab construction days hotel requires sprucing deter traveller price reasonable nice location walking distance metro continous hot water housekeeping chance enjoy gourmet breakfast tulip inn hotel overall bad istanbul expensive am avoid taxis metro buses boat trams enjoyed trip lot
